title: Don't mix pregnancy with... aspirin
body:
The EURO-PERISTAT report shows that Poland has one of the highest rates of cesarean section in Europe.
Aspirin is a great medicine.
It works antipyretic, anti-inflammatory and anticoagulant.
Long could be exchanged what does good.
Unfortunately, the list of side effects is also long.
{{NEG}}I tell most patients to look at aspirin during pregnancy.
{{HEDGE}}Because the results of the study showed some correlation between pregnant women taking acetylsalicylic acid and the occurrence of serious complications.
The most commonly described are: cleft palate, heart defects, lower birth weight of newborns.
{{NEG}}In addition, the risk of perinatal complications decreases.
{{HYPER}}There are single cases of women for whom I recommend aspirin - e.g.
women with hypertension.
Or if I know that in a previous pregnancy the baby did not grow (aspirin prevents hypotrophy).
